summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all 10 requirements from the BuildRequest. The backend includes complete data models, query functions, category system, and ratings/reviews functionality. The frontend implements all UI components including home page, search interface, category browsing, app detail pages, and review submission forms. The design incorporates a vibrant, modern app store interface with proper color schemes, typography hierarchy, and responsive layouts. No missing requirements or hallucinated features were identified.
